data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 47 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 please find enclosed herewith Newspaper Publication regarding Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company scheduled to be held on Friday February 13 2026 for adoption of Unaudited (Standalone & Consolidated) Financial Results for the 3rd Quarter and Nine Months Ended December 31 2025: along with the Limited Review Report of the Statutory Auditors of the Company. Notice had been published in both Business Standard and Saksham (Local) on February 06 2026.

We request you to take the above information on record and acknowledge receipt of the same

data.news_body:
We reference to the above captioned matter pursuant to Regulation 74(5) of SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulation 2018 we here submit the Certificate received from M/s. R&D Infotech Private Ltd. Registrar and Share Transfer Agent of the Company for the Quarter Ended 31st December 2025.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body:
Notice is hereby given that in pursuance of SEBI (PIT) Regulations 2015 and Companys Code of Conduct for Regulating Monitoring and Reporting of Trading by Insiders the Trading Window for dealing in the securities of the Company shall remain closed from 01/01/2026 till 45 hours after the public announcement through Board of Directors in their Meeting to be held for announcing the unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results for the 3rd Quarter and Nine Months Ending on 31/12/2025 along with other matter for which trading window is required to be closed.
The Board Meeting date to approve the Unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the 3rd Quarter and Nine Months Ending on 31/12/2025 will be informed in due course.
All Promoters/designated/connected persons are advise not to trade in the securities of the Company during the aforesaid period of Closure of Trading Window.

data.caption: Prudential Sugar Corporation Limited To Enter Into Two Wheeler And Three Wheeler Electric Vehicle (EV) Segment
data.news_body: Prudential Sugar Corporation Ltd. has entered into a MoU with Senatla EV Products Pvt Ltd Senatla Innovative EV Components Pvt Ltd. and two others for subscribing and acquiring 76% Equity stake value at Rs.4.00 Crores approx in Senatla Innovative EV Components Pvt Ltd which is presently engaged in manufacturing and sale of Electric Two Wheelers and Electrical Three Wheelers.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 47 of SEBI (LODR) Regulation 2015 please find enclosed herewith Newspaper Publication of the Notice of the 34th Annual General Meeting (AGM) to be held on Tuesday September 30 2025 and e Voting related Instructions thereto in both Standard and Saksham (Local) newspaper on Saturday September 06 2025.

We request you to take the above information on record and acknowledge receipt of  the same.

data.caption: Reg. 34 (1) Annual Report.
data.news_body: we hereby submits the 34th Annual Report of Prudential Sugar Corporation Limited (the Company) for the FY ended March 31 2025 along with the Notice of the 34th Annual General Meeting to be held on September 30 2025 have been sent electronically to the members who have registered their email ID as per the SEBI guideline. The aforesaid documents are available on the Company website i.e. www.prudentialsugar.com and are also available for inspection at the Registered Office of the Company during office hours Further inform you that U/Sec. 108 of the Companies Act 2013 and the Rules 2014 as amended and Reg.44 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 the Company is pleased to provide its members facility to exercise their right to vote on resolutions proposed to be passed in the AGM by electronic means. The details as per the provisions of the Companies Act 2013 are given in the attached Notice. This intimation is also uploaded on the Company website: www.prudentialsugar.com

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body:
In accordance with SEBI circular no. SEBI/HO/MIRSD/MIRSD-PoD/P/2025/97 dated 2nd July 2025 a special window has been opened for re-lodgement of transfer deeds which were lodged prior to the deadline of April 01 2019 and reject/returned/ not attended to due to deficiency in the documents/process/or otherwise.

Pursuant to the aforesaid the Company has published details of opening of the window in the July 24th 2025 editions of the daily newspaper Business Standard and Sakshyam (Telugu).

Please find enclosed herewith newspaper clippings of the notice.

This is for your information and records

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Scrutinizer"s Report
data.news_body:
In compliance to reg. 44 of SEBI (LODR reg. 2015 as amended from time to time (Listing Regulations) please nfind enclosed herewith Scrutinizers Report dosclosing voting results of the Extra-Ordinary General Meeting of Prudential Sugar Corporation Limited (The Company) held on June 28 2025 at 12:30 PM through VC & OAVM..

It is to inform that the Resolution set out in the Notice of the eEGM was duly approved by shareholders with requisite majority. The Scrutinizers report has been enclosed to this letter is also uploaded on the website of the Company.

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Outcome of EGM
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Reg. 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we are pleased to provided hereunder proceedings of Extra Ordinary General Meeting  (EGM) of the Company held on June 28 2025 through Video Conferencing and other audio visual means.

The Meeting commenced at 12:30 pm and concluded at 12:57 pm.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body:
Notice is hereby given that in pursuance of SEBI (PIT) Reg. 2015 and Companys Code of Conduct for Regulating Monitoring and Reporting of Trading by Insiders the Trading Window for dealing in the securities of the Company shall remain closed from July 01 2025 till 48 hours from the publication announcement through Board of Directors in their meeting held for announcing the Unaudited Financial Results for the 1 Quarter ended 30.06.2025 along with other matter for which trading window is required to be closed.
The Board Meeting date to approve the Unaudited financial Results of the Company for the 1 Quarter ended 30.06.2025 will be informed in due course.
All Promoters/designated/connected persons are advised not to trade in the securities of the Company during the aforesaid period of Closure of Trading Window
We request you to take the above information on record and acknowledge the receipt of the same.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 47 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 Please find enclosed herewith clipping of Newspaper Publication of EGM Notice including eVoting related procedure/instructions published in Business Standard and Saksham (Local) on June 05 2025 for the Extraordinary General Meeting of the Company to be held on Saturday June 28 2025.

We request you to take the above information on record and acknowledge receipt of the same.

data.caption: Intimation Pursuant To Regulations 30 And 44 Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 - Notice Convening Extra Ordinary General Meeting Of The Members Of The Company On Saturday 28Th June 2025 At 12.30 P.M. (IST) Thro
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Reg. 30 of the SEBI (LODR) Reg. 2015 SEBI Listing REg. we would like to inform you that the EOGM of Prudential Sugar Corporation Ltd. is scheduled to be held on Saturday 28 June 2025 at 12.30 PM through VC/OAVM to seek the approval of the members on the proposal as probided in the enclosed EGM Notice dated 31.05.2025 in compliance with the applicable provisions of the MCA & SEBI read with the circulars notifications issued from time to time by MCA/SEBI.
The Notice of the EGM along with its annexures is being send only through electronic mode to those members whose email addresses are registered with the Company/Depository Participants as on 30.05.2025 beeing the cut off date for determining shareholders for sending notices of EGM the deemed venue for the EGM shall be registered office of the Company.
The Notice of the EGM of the Company along with its annexures can be accessed on the website of the Company at www.prudentialsugar.com website of stock exchange i.e.BSE & NSE

data.caption: Compliances-Reg.24(A)-Annual Secretarial Compliance
data.news_body:
In Compliance with Regulation 24A of SEBI (LODR) Reg. 2015 Board appointed M/s. RBM & Associates practiscing Company Secretary Kolkata as Secretarial Auditor of the Company for the Financial Year ended March 31 2025. They carried out the Secretarial Audit and submitted the Annual Secretarial Compliance Report with reference to the SEBI circular CIR/CFD/CMPI/27/2019 dated February 8 2019.

We hereby submit the Annual Secretarial Compliance Report issued by the Secretarial Audit within the timeline allowed by SEBI Circular vide Number SEBI/HO/CFD/CMDI/P/CIR/2021/556 dated April 29 2021. 
We request you to take the above information on record and acknowledge the receipt of the same.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 47 of SEBI (LODR) Reg. 2015 please find enclosed herewith Newspaper publication on Audited (Standalone & Consolidated) Financial Results for the 4th Quarter and Year ended 31.03.2025 announced by the Board of Directors in its meeting held on Friday 30.05.2025 Financial Results has been published in both Business Standard and Saksham (Local) newspapers on 31.03.2025.

We request you to take the above information on record and acknowledge receipt of the same.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held Today I.E. Saturday May 31 2025
data.news_body:
With regards to the captioned matter and pursuant to Regulation 30 and other applicable provisions of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (Listing Regulations) we wish to inform you that at the meeting of the Board of Directors of Prudential Sugar Corporation Limited held today i.e. Saturday May 31 2025 at the Registered Office of the Company situated at Akash Ganga 4th Floor Plot No.144 Srinagar Colony Hyderabad - 500 073 Telangana India the Board of Directors of the Company (Board) has discussed deliberated considered and approved the following matters:
The Board Meeting commenced at 01:00 pm and concluded at 04:30 pm.

data.caption:
Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On Friday May 30 2025 Of 
Prudential Sugar Corporation Limited.
data.news_body:
In just concluded Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company the Board has considered and approved:
1. Audited (Standalone and Consolidated) Financial Statements for the Quarter ended March 31 2025 (annexed herewith)
2. Limited Review Report from the Statutory Auditors on Audited (Standalone and Consolidated) Financial Statements for the Quarter and Year ended March 312025 (annexed herewith).
We hereby inform you that the Board Meeting had commenced at 3.00 pm and concluded at 7.00 pm for your information.
This intimation is also uploaded on the Company website: www.prudentialsugarcom.
We request you to take the above intimation on record and acknowledge receipt of the same.

data.caption:
Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On Friday May 30 2025 Of 
Prudential Sugar Corporation Limited.
data.news_body:
In just concluded Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company the Board has considered and approved:
1. Audited (Standalone and Consolidated) Financial Statements for the Quarter ended March 31 2025 (annexed herewith)
2. Limited Review Report from the Statutory Auditors on Audited (Standalone and Consolidated) Financial Statements for the Quarter and Year ended March 312025 (annexed herewith).
We hereby inform you that the Board Meeting had commenced at 3.00 pm and concluded at 7.00 pm for your information.
This intimation is also uploaded on the Company website: www.prudentialsugarcom.
We request you to take the above intimation on record and acknowledge receipt of the same.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On Friday May 30 2025 Of  Prudential Sugar Corporation Limited.
data.news_body:
In just concluded Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company the Board has considered and approved: 

1. Audited (Standalone and Consolidated) Financial Statements for the 4th Quarter and Year Ended March 31 2025 (annexed herewith).
2. Limited Review Report from the Statutory Auditors on Audited (Standalone and Consolidated) Financial Statements for the 4th Quarter and Year Ended March 31 2025 (annexed herewith).

We hereby inform you that the Board Meeting had commenced at 03:00 PM and concluded at 06:50 PM for your information.

This intimation is also uploaded on the company website: www.prudentialsugar.com

We request you to take the above information on record and acknowledge receipt of the same.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Of The Board Meeting Of Prudential Sugar Corporation Limited To Be Held On Saturday May 31 2025.
Application For Grant Of In- Principle Approval.
data.news_body:
This is further to our letter of May 16 2025 regarding the E-voting process which we proposed to undertake in connection with our preferential issue of 12500000 of equity shares as per your directions issued on 5th May 2025.

In this regard we wish to inform you that we are not in a position to conduct the e-voting as scheduled from 22.05.2025 to 24.05.2025 (both days inclusive) due to certain technical difficulties with the depositories to go through the process. As such we are proposing to reschedule the said e-voting in co-ordination/collaboration with NSDL as early as possible and keep the Exchange  informed accordingly.

We would request you to take this information on record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body:
In compliance with Regulation 47 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 please find enclosed herewith Newspaper Publication regarding Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company Scheduled to be held on Friday May 30 2025 for adoption of Audited (Standalone & Consolidated) Financial Results for the 4th Quarter and Year Ended March 31 2025 along with the Statutory Auditors Report of the Company. Notice has been published in both Business Standard and Saksham (Local) newspaper on May 21 2025.

We request you to take the above information on record and acknowledge receipt of the same.

data.caption:
Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Of Board Meeting To Be Held On Friday May 30 2025
 Of Prudential Sugar Corporation Limited
data.news_body:
Prudential Sugar Corporation Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 30/05/2025 inter alia to consider and approve 
With reference to the above captioned subject matter pursuant to the refereed regulations od SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 mentioned above we hereby inform you that the Meeting of Board of Directors of the Company will be held at 03:00 P.M. on Friday May 30 2025 at the Registered Office of the Company inter-alia to consider the following matters:

1. Consider and adopt the Audited Financial Statement (Standalone and Consolidated) for the 4th Quarter and Year Ended March 31 2025;
2. Consider the Limited Review Report of the Statutory Auditors on Standalone and Consolidated Unaudited Financial Statement for the 4th Quarter and Year Ended March 31 2025;
3. Other Business items.   

This intimation is also being uploaded on the Company website: www.prudentialsugar.com. 
We request you to take the above information on record and acknowledge receipt of the same.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held Today I.E. Friday May 16 2025.
data.news_body: With regards to the captioned matter and pursuant to Regulation 30 and other applicable provisions of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (Listing Regulations) we wish to inform you that at the meeting of the Board of Directors of Prudential Sugar Corporation Limited held today i.e. Friday May 16 2025 at the Registered office of the Company  (Board) considered deliberated and discussed approved / noted the following matters:

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Revised Notice Of Meeting Of Board Of Directors Rescheduled To Be Held On Friday May 16 2025 Of Prudential Sugar Corporation Limited
data.news_body:
Prudential Sugar Corporation Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 16/05/2025 inter alia to consider and approve Further to our intimation of Notice of the Board Meeting of the Company scheduled to be held on Wednesday May 14 2025 (sent to the Exchange on 07.05.2025) we would like to inform you that due to non-availability of a few Directors the said Meeting has been rescheduled for Friday May 16 2025.

We would request you to kindly take this communication on record as the revised Notice of the Board Meeting.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Of Board Meeting To Be Held On Wednesday May 14 2025 Of Prudential Sugar Corporation Limited
data.news_body:
Prudential Sugar Corporation Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 14/05/2025 inter alia to consider and approve This is to inform you that the Meeting of Board of Directors of the Company will be held at 02:30 P.M. on Wednesday May 14 2025 at the Registered Office of the Company to discuss and approve the following matters:

1. To undertake the process of e-voting on account of change in object of the proposed preferential issues as directed by the Stock Exchange.
2. To Appoint the Scrutinizer for remote e voting process. 
3. To Approve Communication to be sent to shareholders for e Voting.
4. Any other matter with permission of the Chair.

Practicing Company Secretaries certifying Compliance pertaining to the issue of share certificates relating to transfer of shares within the prescribed time limit under the aforesaid regulation.

data.news_body: Please find attached certified true copy of the order of honourable High Court for the state of Telangana Hyderabad for your kind information and records

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body:
Notice is hereby given that in pursuance of SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 the Trading Window for dealing in the securities of the Company shall remain closed from April 01 2025 till 48 hours after declaration of Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and Financial Year Ending on March 31 2025 along with other matter for which trading window is required to be closed.
The date of Board Meeting to approve the Audited Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and Financial Year Ending on March 31 2025 will be informed in due course.
All Promoters/Designated/connected persons are advised not to trade in the securities of the Company during the aforesaid period of closure of Trading Window.
We request you to take the above information on record and acknowledge receipt of the same.

data.caption: Disclosure Of Debarment Statement Regarding Appointment Of Director
data.news_body:
This is in continuation of our disclosure dated 30.09.2024 regarding appointment of independent directors of Mr. Dilip Raj Singhvi Ms. Shilpa Bung and Mr. Pradeep Chaturvedi. We would like to provide an affirmation that these personnel being appointed as Independent Directors are not debarred from holding the office of director by virtue of any SEBI order or any other such authority. This is in compliance with information as required pursuant to BSE Circular with ref. no. LIST/COMP/14/2018-19 and the NSE Circular with ref. no. NSE/CML/2018/24 dated 20.06.2018.

Kindly take the above information on record.

data.caption: Warning Letter Issued By BSE/NSE - Prudential Sugar Corporation Limited
data.news_body:
This is to state that the BSE/NSE have issued a warning letter date 31.01.2025 to the Company observing that there was a deviation in the compliance with the exchange communications in respect of an announcement submitted by the Company under Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (SEBI LODR) and required the Company to disseminate a copy of the warning letter on the Stock Exchange where the Companions shares are listed.

Accordingly in compliance with the Exchanges requirement the said warning letter is disseminated.

We reference to the above captioned subject matter pursuant to Regulation 74(5) of SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulation 2018 we hereby submit the Certificate received from M/s. R&D Infotech Private Limited Registrar and Share Transfer Agent of the Company for the Quarter Ended 31st December 2024.

data.caption: Clarification Regarding Non-Submission Of EGM Notice.
data.news_body:
With reference to your letter dt. 27.01.2025 seeking clarification regarding non-submission of Notice of EGM we would like to submit that we missed to upload the said notice by sheer oversight and was not deliberate nor intentional on the part of the company as the company has the practice of submission of such documents to exchange promptly.

However this was a humble error that by oversight the document could not be uploaded and as such we would request that this lapse on the part of the company may please be taken as not intentional and condone the lapse.

However as required in compliance with regulation 30(2) and read with 36(2)(ii) and Clause 12 of Para A of SEBI (LODR) regulations 2015 we hereby re-submit the said EGM Notice with a request to take the same on record.

We take this opportunity to reassure the exchange that in future we will ensure such lapses will not occur.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body:
Notice is hereby given that in pursuance of SEBI (PIT) Reg. 2015 and Companys Code of Conduct for Regulating Monitoring and Reporting of Trading by Insiders the Trading Window for dealing in the securities of the Company shall remain closed from January 01 2025 till 48 hours from the public announcement through Board of Directors in their Meeting held for announcing the Unaudited Financial Result for the 3rd Quarter and Nine Months Ended on December 31 2024 along with other matters for which trading window is required to be closed.

the Board date to approve the Unaudited Financial Result of the Company for the 3rd Quarter and Nine Months Ended on December 31 2024 will be informed in due course.

All Promoters/ designated/connected persons are advised not to trade in the securities of the Company during the aforesaid period of closure of Trading Window. 

We request you to take the above information on record and acknowledge receipt of the same.

data.caption: Memorandum Of Understanding Between Government Of Rajasthan And Prudential Sugar Corporation Limited, Hyderabad, Telangana;
data.news_body: We are pleased to inform that the Company has entered into Memorandum of Understanding with the Government of Rajasthan for establishing 100 MW Solar Park at Bikaner Rajasthan.A copy of MoU entered with the Government of Rajasthan is enclosed with this letter for your information and for taking the same on records.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Of Prudential Sugar Corporation Limited
data.news_body: In just concluded Meeting of Board of Directors, the Board has approved and considered the following items:1.   Unaudited (Standalone and Consolidated ) Financial Statements for the Quarter and Half year ended September 30, 2024 (Annexed here with).2. Limited Review Report from the Statutory Auditor on Unaudited (Standalone and Consolidated) Financial Statements for the Quarter and Half Year ended September 30, 2024 (Annexed herewith)3. Reconstitution of the Audit Committee, Nomination & Remuneration Committee and Stakeholders Relationship Committee of the Company.4. data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: pursuant to Regulation 30 read with part A of Schedule III of SEBI (LODR) , Reg 2015 (Listing Regulations'') , we would like to inform you that the Company has received approval  of its members by Special Resolutions passed in the 33rd AGM  of the Company held ltoday i.e., 30.09.2024  for appointment of Mr. Dilip Raj Somgjvo, Ms. Shilpa Bung  and Mr. Pradeep Chaturvedi as Independent (Non -Executive) Director of the Company with effect from 01.10.2024 in place of retiring Independent (Non-Executive) Directors, Mr. Y. Ravinder Reddy, Ms. Sadhana Bansali   and Kishore Jhunjhunwala  whose current period of office is expiring today i.e, 30.09.2024The relevant details of the captioned appointment and retirement, as per the requirement of Regulations 30 of SEBI  (Listing  Obligation s and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 read with SEBI Circular #SEBI /HO/CFD/CRF-PoD-1/P/CIR/2023/123 dt. 13.07.2023, are given in the enclosed Annexure-AWe request you to take the above information

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Notice is hereby given that in pursuance of SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015 and Company''s Code of Conduct for Regulating, Monitoring and Reporting of Trading by Insiders, the Trading Window for dealing in the securities of the Company shall remain closed from October 01, 2024 till 48 hours after the public announcement through Board of Directors in their Meeting held for announcing the Unaudited Financial Results for the Quarter and Half year ended on September 30, 2024 along with other matters for which trading window is required to be closed.The Board Meeting date to approve the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and Half year ended on September 30, 2024 will be informed in due course.All Promoters/designated/connected persons are advised not to trade in the securities of the Company during the aforesaid period of Closure of Trading Window.We request you to take the above information on record and acknowledge receipt of the same.

The meeting was held in compliance with Circulars issued by Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA) # 14/2020 dated April 08, 2020#02/2021 dated January 31, 2021, and Circular No. 02/2022 dated May 05, 2022 and SEBI Circular No.SEBI/HO/CFD/CMDI/CIR/P/2020/79 dated May 12, 2020, Circular No.SEBI/HO/CFD/CMD2/CIR/P/2021/11 dated January 15, 2021 and Circular No. SEBI/HO/DDHS/P/CIR/2022/0063 dated May 13, 2022, issued by SEBI and other applicable provisions of the Companies Act, 2013 read with rules made thereunder.The Meeting commenced at 2:30 P.M. and concluded at 2:51 P.M. all the requisite Statutory Registers and other requisite documents were available electronically during the AGM for inspection by the members.

The Board of Directors of the Company ('Board') considered, deliberated and discussed, approved / noted the following matters:

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Of Board Meeting To Be Held On Tuesday September 24, 2024 Of Prudential Sugar Corporation Limited
data.news_body: PRUDENTIAL SUGAR CORPORATION LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 24/09/2024 ,inter alia, to consider and approve This is to inform you that the Meeting of Board of Directors of the Company will be held on Tuesday, September 24, 2024 to discuss the following agenda.1. To discuss and decide to raise funds through Rights issue; Follow on Public Issue; Preferential Issue; Placement to QIP and other means as may deem fit and proper by Board under the provisions of Companies Act of an amount not exceeding Rs 50 Crores to fund future expansion/diversification of Company's business into diverse areas.2. Any other matter with permission of the Chair.This intimation is also being uploaded on the Company website: www.prudentialsugar.com We request you to take the above information on record and acknowledge receipt of the same.

data.news_body:
1. Audited (Standalone and Consolidated) Financial Statements for the 4th Quarter and Year Ended March 31, 2023 (annexed herewith);

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On May 30, 2023 Of Prudential Sugar Corporation Limited
data.news_body: In just concluded Meeting of the Board Directors of the Company, the Board has considered and approved:1. Audited (Standalone and Consolidated) Financial Statements for the 4th Quarter and Year Ended March 31, 2023 (annexed herewith);2. Limited Review Report from the Statutory Auditor on Audited (Standalone and Consolidated) Financial Statements for the 4th Quarter and Year Ended March 31, 2023 (annexed herewith);We hereby submit that the Board Meeting had commenced at 05:30 PM and concluded at 09:30 PM, for your information.This intimation is also uploaded on the Company website: www.prudentialsugar.com.We request you to take the above information on record and acknowledge receipt of the same.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On May 30, 2023 Of Prudential Sugar Corporation Limited
data.news_body:
In just concluded Meeting of the Board Directors of the Company, the Board has considered and approved:

1. Audited (Standalone and Consolidated) Financial Statements for the 4th Quarter and Year Ended March 31, 2023 (annexed herewith);
2. Limited Review Report from the Statutory Auditor on Audited (Standalone and Consolidated) Financial Statements for the 4th Quarter and Year Ended March 31, 2023 (annexed herewith);

We hereby submit that the Board Meeting had commenced at 05:30 PM and concluded at 09:30 PM, for your information.

This intimation is also uploaded on the Company website: www.prudentialsugar.com.

We request you to take the above information on record and acknowledge receipt of the same.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Meeting Updates
data.news_body:
With reference to your email regarding the additional details required for Corporate Announcement filed under Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015, we hereby submit that the Board Meeting had commenced at 03:00 PM and concluded at 05:00 PM, for your information.

We regret that Board Meeting conclusion time was inadvertently missed out and was not an intentional act which may please be considered and request you not to penalize.
We request you to take the above information and record and acknowledge the receipt of the same.

We request you to take the above information on record and acknowledge the receipt of the same.
